scripts.test:e2e:ci: firebase emulators:exec --project prispevkyrodicu "node scripts/seedEmulator.mjs && VITE_E2E=true VITE_USE_EMULATORS=true npm run build && VITE_E2E=true VITE_USE_EMULATORS=true npm run preview -- --host 127.0.0.1 --port 4173 --strictPort & PREVIEW_PID=$! && sleep 3 && 'PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4173 npm run test:e2e'; STATUS=$?; kill $PREVIEW_PID; exit $STATUS"
